skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Proficient in frontend development using React js(javascript), html, and css.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Proficient in backend development using Spring Boot (Java), Python (Django and Flask), Node.js, and Express.js.

skills.title: DevOps
skills.description: Experience with DevOps practices including continuous integration, deployment, containerization (Docker), and orchestration (Kubernetes). Familiar with CI/CD pipelines and tools like Jenkins and GitLab CI.

skills.title: Software Engineering
skills.description: Strong foundation in software engineering principles and practices. Skilled in designing scalable and maintainable systems, writing clean and efficient code, and implementing best coding practices. Proficient in problem-solving and troubleshooting.

portfolio.title: ChatEase
portfolio.description: ChatEase is a chat application built using Node.js and WebSockets. It allows users to communicate in real-time and exchange messages instantly. The demo link is on github

portfolio.title: MealDrop
portfolio.description: MealDrop is a meal delivery platform built using microservices and Node.js. It aims to simplify the process of ordering and delivering meals to customers.

portfolio.title: Ecommerce
portfolio.description: Ecommerce is an e-commerce platform developed using Spring Boot. It provides users with a seamless shopping experience and efficient management of products.

testimonials.description: Working with this team was a transformative experience! Their innovative solutions propelled our project to new heights.
Absolutely outstanding service! They not only met but exceeded our expectations, delivering exceptional results with finesse.
From concept to execution, they flawlessly brought our vision to life, leaving us in awe of their creativity and dedication.
